Rowset.name: TopDistributionHistory
Rowset.identifier: -> select top 1000 * from [distribution].[dbo].[MSdistribution_history] (nolock) order by time desc

Rowset.name: TopLogReaderHistory
Rowset.identifier: -> select top 1000 * from [distribution].[dbo].[MSlogreader_history] (nolock) order by time desc

Rowset.name: TopMSmerge_historyTime
Rowset.identifier: -> select top 1000 * from [distribution].[dbo].[MSmerge_history] (nolock) order by time desc

Rowset.name: TopQReaderHistory
Rowset.identifier: -> select top 1000 * from [distribution].[dbo].[MSqreader_history] (nolock) order by start_time desc

Rowset.name: TopReplCommands
Rowset.identifier: -> select top 1000 publisher_database_id,xact_seqno,count(*) as numcommands from [distribution].[dbo].[MSrepl_commands] (nolock) group by publisher_database_id,xact_seqno order by publisher_database_id,numcommands DESC

Rowset.name: TopReplErrorGrouping
Rowset.identifier: -> select error_code,[Count]=count(*) from [distribution].[dbo].[msrepl_errors] GROUP BY error_code

Rowset.name: TopReplErrors
Rowset.identifier: -> select top 1000 * from [distribution].[dbo].[msrepl_errors] ORDER BY [TIME] DESC

Rowset.name: TopSnapshotHistory
Rowset.identifier: -> select top 1000 * from [distribution].[dbo].[MSsnapshot_history] (nolock) order by time desc
